name: Venkatesh Babu Radhakrishnan
content: R. Venkatesh Babu's Homepage Welcome to my homepage Home Vision and AI Lab Publications For Prospective Students Positions R. Venkatesh Babu I am a professor and Chair of the Dept. of Computational and Data Sciences (CDS), Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bangalore. I received my doctorate degree from the Dept. of Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. I held postdoctoral positions at  NTNU, Norway and IRISA/INRIA, Rennes, France, through ERCIM fellowship. I also worked as a research fellow at NTU, Singapore. I spent couple of years working in industry before joining IISc in August 2010. My research interests include Computer Vision and Deep Learning. I am a recipient of the SERB Star (2020) and Sathish Dhawan Young Engineer Awards (2019). I am a senior member of IEEE, AAAI, Distinguised Member of ACM and Fellow of INAE. I have been recognized in the Stanford/Elsevier Top 2% Scientists List for 2020 to 2025, and recognized as the top AI researcher in India by the CSRankings.org. I have served as a Program Chair of the AIML-Systems 2023 conference, General Co-Chair of CVIP 2024, General Chair of ICVGIP'24 and General Chair of CVIP'25. Check our Vision and AI lab's Publication page or my Google Scholar page for more details.
